DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effects of high intensity interval training compared to moderate exercise training and a control group on exercise capacity and quality of life in patients with end stage renal disease on hemodialysis.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of High-intensity Interval Training in Patients in Hemodialysis
DOC.criteria: Patients on hemodialysis â‰¥ 3 months Acute infection Systolic BP>180 mmHG or diabolic BP>105 mmHG Unstable angina pectoris Serious rhythm disturbances Hyperkalemic (> 6 mmol/L), Unstable diabetes mellitus Wheelchair Dialyses access on lower extremities Haemoglobin < 9 g/dl
